    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.UpdatePortfolioProjectStatus</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Update portfolio project with latest status of the project</description>
        <name>UpdatePortfolioProjectStatus</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var UpdatePortfolioProjectStatus = Class.create();
UpdatePortfolioProjectStatus.prototype = {
	initialize: function(current) {
		this.projStatusRec = current;
	},
	
	updateStatus: function() {
		
		var project = new GlideRecord('pm_project');
		project.get(this.projStatusRec.project);
		if(project.isValidRecord()){
			project.setValue('status', this.projStatusRec.overall_health);
			project.update();
		}
		
		var portfolioProj = new GlideRecord('pm_portfolio_project');
		portfolioProj.addQuery('pm_project', this.projStatusRec.project);
		portfolioProj.query();
		if(portfolioProj.next()) {
			portfolioProj.schedule = this.projStatusRec.schedule;
			portfolioProj.scope = this.projStatusRec.scope;
			portfolioProj.resources = this.projStatusRec.resources;
			portfolioProj.overall_health = this.projStatusRec.overall_health;
			portfolioProj.budget = this.projStatusRec.budget;
			portfolioProj.cost_color = this.projStatusRec.cost;
			portfolioProj.update();
		}
	},
	
	type: 'UpdatePortfolioProjectStatus'
};]]></script>
